mapper.insert: INSERT INTO join_saving(guest_id, account_number, sms_transfer, sms_maturity, contribution_amount, transfer_amount, transfer_period) VALUES (#{guest_id}, #{account_number}, #{sms_transfer}, #{sms_maturity}, #{contribution_amount}, #{amount}, #{period})
mapper.select: select g2.name as openerName, js.guest_id as invitedGuestId, js.account_number as accountNumber, js.join_date as inviteDate, sa.saving_name as savingName, p.name as petName, p.image as petImg, sa.category as category, psp.rate as rate, psp.description as description, psp.min_balance as minBalance, psp.max_balance as maxBalance, psp.image as productImg, sa.end_date as endDate, sa.join_period as joinPeriod, sa.final_amount as finalAmount, sa.interest_amount as interestAmount from guest g join join_saving js on g.guest_id = js.guest_id join saving_account sa on sa.account_number = js.account_number join pet p on p.pet_id = sa.pet_id join guest g2 on g2.guest_id = sa.opener_id join pet_saving_product psp on psp.category = sa.category where sa.account_number = #{accountNumber}
